111.content:
"Scott! I'm all out of Cheetos!" Ramona Flowers yelled to her boyfriend as she wiped off the Cheeto dust from her hands. Taking a sip from her extra large soft drink, she let out a belch and focused back on her TV special.

"Coming Ramona dearest!" a voice yelled from the kitchen. That voice belonged to non other than Scott Pilgrim, all around average boy. Well that wasn't entirely true. While he looked average with his unkempt hair, green shirt and jeans ensemble, he had more fighting experience than you can shake a stick at. He had managed to defeat Ramona's seven evil exes, including the extremely tough Gideon Graves. Now Ramona was his and he had been doing something... somewhat unusual with his new found girlfriend.

You see Scott was in to larger women. While he enjoyed Ramona at her current size, he had always wondered what she would look like with some extra weight. Opening a huge bag of Cheetos, Scott proceeded to head to Ramona's living room to grace her with the snack food, doing everything in his power to keep her from being too active. Ramona had to be at least 20 pounds heavier than she had been before dating Scott. He had been working the past month to add calories to her food and thus fat to her body and his handiwork showed! Ramona now had a cute double chin whenever she would look down. Soon enough it would be a permanent fixture, or at least Scott hoped so. They strained her black tanktop, cleavage welling slightly over the top of the material due to their size. Under her breasts rested a pudgy little belly. "So how is the new promotion at Amazon treating you?" Scott said curiously, genuinely wondering if Ramona enjoyed her new position at the online shopping giant.

121.content:
It all started after the events of the series and Knives finally reached peace with Scot and left for college.
Knives had finally started coming out of her shell when she found the sudden change into college life was alot to take. All these new people in a new place that she didn't know, the pressure that comes with new room mates you don't know, and the difficulty of balancing college lectures with a fledgeling social life. In the end it got all a bit too much for her and her mind just sort of shut down.

Knives found that life got alot easier and less stressful if you stopped worrying about it all, and so that is what she did. So what started out as a period of 'rest' to get everything back together pretty much never stopped, days were spent simply lounging around her student accomodation in her pyjamas whilst watching tv, and snacking. Occasionally her room mates dragged her outside but she always made them pick somewhere to go that was both close by and had seating, for frankly she couldn't be bothered with the walking.

A few weeks of this had resulted in a small gain in Knives, a little belly had started to form but she didn't care, she just chose to lay on the couch snacking all day long, until....

123.content:
Knives finds herself sitting in the pizza joint that she and Scott used to frequent, tears streaming down her face as she cries out in anguish. To fall in love for the first time in her life and then to be broken up less than a minute after confessing it to him....Knives is truely devistated and heart broken.
She has no idea why she came here, only that she could not go home like this, her father would freak out and maybe go insane. So she just sits there, alone in her booth crying her eyes out until she is told by an overly unforgiving waitress that she has to order something or leave. Without thinking she orders the usual pizza she would have with Scott as a force of habit and then cries some more.
She is eventually brought the pizza, it is the largest size the resteraunt has and given that she only ever ate 1/4 of it, she knew she could not manage the entire thing by herself. Looking at it she cries some more and begins to eat, not wanting to waste food.
And so she begins to eat the first slice, still crying over what has transpired.
By the time she begins to eat the third slice, her crying has moved to sobbing, and by the time she begins to eat the forth slice, her sobbing has stopped as her focus is now on the food.
The other slices pass by unnoticed until she finds she has finished the entire thing. Her stomach distored and bloated as she ate 4 times as much pizza as she could handle and is therefore in pain...but not the same kind of pain as her broken heart felt. No this pain was much more tolerable as she just groans and rubs her swollen stomach, her mind taken off of Scott Pilgrim as the eating proved to be a fantastic distraction for her.
After letting her stomach settle for a bit she pays the bill and heads to the bus stop, her mind still full of Scott, yet she does not feel quite so sad. Only after passing the doughnut shop does she think that perhaps eating all that pizza is what brought her some comfort during her suffering. Placing her hand on her swollen and painful stomach she comes to the conclusion that this must be the case and immediately goes back to the doughnut shop she just passed to buy two dozen doughnuts to take home. Hopeing not to need them but deciding it's better to have them and not need them than need them and not have them.
Later at home....
123.title: Depression and Comfort Eating.

124.content:
In a tangent universe where Scott Pilgrim likes fat girls he finds himself dateing Knives Chau, a cute and timid chinese girl.

Dating her is 'nice' but she is far too small for his tastes, and though he has hopes for making her gain, so far all his more subtle attempts have failed him and soon his attention was drawn to the more shapely Ramona Flowers. Things from there went very strangely for Scott, he began dating both Ramona and Knives and after fighting her 1st evil ex at the gig, he is confronted by his friends. Scott is forced to make up his mind as what to do and eventually is convinced that he should tell Knives the truth before he breaks her heart.

And so, on the day he was to tell her his preferences, she blurts out that she's "in love" with him.
"um, listen...i like you knives...but i only love 'fat' girls." he says uncomfortably "i wont ask you to get fat for me unless you want to....so i think we should break up or whatever"

After his confession knives goes really quiet and just stares at Scott shocked. Scott meanwhile is too embarrased to look at her and just looks away.
"really?" she asks shakily
"yeah..." Scott nods, still not looking at her
"ok" she whispers softly
"ok?" Scott replies shocked "ok you'll get....you know... or ok we should break up?"
"ok i'll get fat" she muttered weakly

Scott is shocked by her remark and the two kiss a long and passionate kiss before going their seperate ways, agreeing to meet tomorrow, giving both of them letting it sink in what has just occured.
Scott returns to his appartment where he tells his 'cool gay room mate' Wallace what has transpired. Scott is over the moon with excitement at the prospects of seeing cute little Knives grow fatter and fatter until his bubble is popped as he's told that he has to now break up with Ramona instead.
Crushed and defeated by the latest revelation, Scott crashes out on the bed clamining he'll do it tomorrow, one attempted break up is enough for one day.
The next day....

I figured since my Metroid interactive was a sleeper hit, why not make another story?
